pages.text: Mine this block to obtain $(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#ore_ghost_eyecon)Ghost Eyecons$(/l)$(br2)Requires an iron pickaxe or better$(br2)Drops:$(li)$(l:ghost/items/blank_ghost_eyecon)Blank Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (47.5%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#ore_ghost_eyecon)Ore Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (9.5%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#musashi_ghost_eyecon)Musashi Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (3.2%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#edison_ghost_eyecon)Edison Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (3.2%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#robin_ghost_eyecon)Robin Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (2.8%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#newton_ghost_eyecon)Newton Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (2.5%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#billy_the_kid_ghost_eyecon)Billy the Kid Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (2.2%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#beethoven_ghost_eyecon)Beethoven Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (2.5%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#benkei_ghost_eyecon)Benkei Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (1.9%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#goemon_ghost_eyecon)Goemon Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (1.9%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#ryoma_ghost_eyecon)Ryoma Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (1.9%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#himiko_ghost_eyecon)Himiko Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (0.9%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#tutankhamun_ghost_eyecon)Tutankhamun Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (1.9%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#nobunaga_ghost_eyecon)Nobunaga Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (1.9%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#houdini_ghost_eyecon)Houdini Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (1.9%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#grimm_ghost_eyecon)Grimm Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (0.9%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#sanzo_ghost_eyecon)Sanzo Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (0.9%)
